Thu Dec 28 03:01:35 PM UTC 2023
🐚 sudo install -d /opt/bin
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libgcrypt-1.10.3/bin/hmac256 /opt/bin//hmac256
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libgcrypt-1.10.3/bin/libgcrypt-config /opt/bin//libgcrypt-config
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libgcrypt-1.10.3/bin/mpicalc /opt/bin//mpicalc
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libgcrypt-1.10.3/bin/dumpsexp /opt/bin//dumpsexp
🐚 sudo install -d /opt/include
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libgcrypt-1.10.3/include/gcrypt.h /opt/include//gcrypt.h
🐚 sudo install -d /opt/lib
🐚 sudo install -d /opt/lib//pkgconfig
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libgcrypt-1.10.3/lib/libgcrypt.so.20 /opt/lib//libgcrypt.so.20
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libgcrypt-1.10.3/lib/libgcrypt.so /opt/lib//libgcrypt.so
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libgcrypt-1.10.3/lib/libgcrypt.so.20.4.3 /opt/lib//libgcrypt.so.20.4.3
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libgcrypt-1.10.3/lib/libgcrypt.la /opt/lib//libgcrypt.la
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libgcrypt-1.10.3/lib/pkgconfig/libgcrypt.pc /opt/lib//pkgconfig/libgcrypt.pc
🐚 sudo install -d /opt/share
🐚 sudo install -d /opt/share//info
🐚 sudo install -d /opt/share//aclocal
🐚 sudo install -d /opt/share//man
🐚 sudo install -d /opt/share//man/man1
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libgcrypt-1.10.3/share/info/gcrypt.info-1 /opt/share//info/gcrypt.info-1
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libgcrypt-1.10.3/share/info/dir /opt/share//info/dir
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libgcrypt-1.10.3/share/info/gcrypt.info /opt/share//info/gcrypt.info
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libgcrypt-1.10.3/share/info/gcrypt.info-2 /opt/share//info/gcrypt.info-2
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libgcrypt-1.10.3/share/aclocal/libgcrypt.m4 /opt/share//aclocal/libgcrypt.m4
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libgcrypt-1.10.3/share/man/man1/hmac256.1 /opt/share//man/man1/hmac256.1
